title: ZTE Blade A5 2020 midrange smartphone now available at Singer Sri Lanka
body_lines: The ZTE Blade A5 2020 is a popular midrange smartphone from global telco equipment giant ZTE, and it is now available online at www.singersl.com and all Singer showrooms and dealers islandwide.Priced at an affordable LKR 33,999/-, the ZTE Blade A5 2020 comes with a more than adequate 2GB of RAM and a 6.088 inch IPS display, for a bright, vivid and immersive experience. The ZTE Blade series of smartphones are noted for their lower prices but comparable performance with similar spec from other brands, providing a great opportunity for those looking for affordable performance.

Attractively and stylishly designed, with fluid curves and a gorgeous back cover, the ZTE Blade A5 2020 is available in three eye-catching colours including a stealthy black, a vibrant blue and a more subtle green. The device also compares very favourably, in terms of price and performance, with other devices that offer 2GB of RAM. As many are significantly more expensive than the ZTE Blade A5 2020, choosing this device will provide users with decent performance at a much lower price point.
